name: Helping Hand
effect: Play this card during scoring. Discard any number of Point cards with a value of 1, 2, or 3 from your hand, then add the point value of the discarded cards to your score this round.

name: Score Booster
effect: Play this card during scoring. Add 2 points to any player's score this round.

name: Score Inversion
effect: Play this card during scoring. Switch the score of the highest-scoring player with the score of the lowest-scoring player after scores have been calculated.

name: Score Sapper
effect: Play this card during scoring. Subtract 2 points from any player's score this round.
